tool_description: The arXiv API allows programmatic access to arXiv's e-print content and metadata, facilitating new and creative use of the vast body of material on arXiv by providing a low barrier to entry for application developers.

api_list.name: arXiv Query API
api_list.description: Retrieves results that match the search query. The API returns results in the Atom 1.0 format.

required_parameters.name: search_query
required_parameters.description: The search query to match against arXiv entries.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The starting index for the results.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.
